name: Absolute Pair Up Free
description:
You will need to exercise your brain and fingers. Most important, you need to be fast. The task is easy – Pair up the same items. However, it is not that easy…

Highlights:
•Addictive gameplay
•Simply and fast fun
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center Support
•It’s FREE!!!
